item.title: I don't care about cookies extension has been acquired by Avast
item.description: Yes, you read it right. Avast has acquired the "I don't care about cookies" extension.

item.title: pythOwO Why the heck did someone makes this a thing?!
item.description: A couple of days ago on r/ProgrammerHumor, I found a guy who made an annoucement where he said that he made a pythOwO language a thing.

item.title: DALL-E Mini: How AI art can be wonderful
item.description: Today I was browsing YouTube when I found a video from Markiplier titled "DALL-E Mini: A Meme Nightmare".
